<!-- Set the report-wide options, and point to the external code file. -->
```{r set_options, echo=F}

  results    = 'show', 
  comment    = NA,

# dpi = 400,

read_chunk("./reports/effects-random/effects-random.R") #This allows knitr to call chunks tagged in the underlying *.R file.
```

# Summary

# Static Tables
The 'aehplus' model (with covariates *a*ge, *e*ducation, *h*ealth, and others) is shown for each combination of

* study,
* process, and
* gender.
